name: Eamonn J. Keogh
content: Eamonn Keogh Eamonn Keogh Distinguished Professor Computer Science & Engineering Department University of California - Riverside Riverside, CA 92521 Phone: (951) 827-2032 eamonn(AT)cs.ucr.edu Welcome to my home page. You may be interested in: My publications. Everything you need to know about Time Series Motifs (A tutorial) The Matrix Profile is the best idea in time series data mining in a decade. The 2018 UCR Time Series Classification page has the largest collection of test datasets in the world. SAX is the best representation for many time series problemsThe UCR Suite the optimally fast method to search under Dynamic Time Warping and Euclidean Distance. It uses the LB_Keogh lowerbound. Winner of SIGKDD best paper and SIGKDD test-of-time award. Things I love and hate I have restored carousel horses I helped restore the most beautiful car in the world I am the world's leading authority on the art of engine turning
